title.narrative: Democratic Consolidation and Transformed Local Governance in Ghana

description.narrative: To facilitate constitutional amendments that will reform Ghana’s hybrid local government system and consolidate democratic stability, peace and security in the Fourth Republic

title.narrative: A more devolved, accountable and capable local multiparty governance system in Ghana

description.narrative: Baseline year 2020 - National referendum on constitutional amendment cancelled due to absence of national consensus. Target year 2022 - National consensus built around the constitutional amendment agenda and the amendment process reinitiated after successful conclusion of the election process.
